name: Muay Time Tracker
short_description:
Muay Time is a free minimalistic time tracking app designed for ultimate productivity.
It’s simple, light-weight and handy.

— Muay Time will never lose task time tracked if even your computer shut down unexpectedly.

— Muay Time will never mess the time tracked due to system time adjustment such as changing timezone, turning into daylight saving time or simply setting up system clock back or forward.

— It’s fully controllable by keyboard hotkeys. So it will not distract you from tasks you are working on. It especially matters for professionals who use keyboard most of the time rather than mouse such as programmers.
summary: Muay Time is a free minimalistic time tracking app.
